title: Empagliflozin enhances metabolic efficiency and improves left ventricular hypertrophy in a hypertrophic cardiomyopathy mouse model
details: T Baka, J Moore, F Qin, SR Yurista, A Zhang, H He… - European Heart Journal, 2025
abstract: Abstract Background and Aims Hypertrophic cardiomyopathy (HCM) is a genetic cardiac disorder characterized by left ventricular hypertrophy (LVH), diastolic dysfunction, and impaired metabolic efficiency. This study investigates the …
